pr_title: Added documentation for onClose hanging problem

timeline.message: Added documentation for onClose hanging problem

timeline.bodyText: I think this needs to be in ForwardingClientCall or friend. This is not part of ClientCall itself.
timeline.author: ejona86
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -141,6 +141,11 @@ public void onMessage(T message) {} * An additional block of trailer metadata may be received at the end of the call from the * server. An empty {@link Metadata} object is passed if no trailers are received. * + *

If uncaught exception is thrown in `onClose`, gRPC will fail to notify the application

replies.bodyText: Sorry, I just realized this is duplicated work as #6107. It seems that merge request is block  for a long time, is there any plan to move forward with this? Do you want me to take #6107 over?
replies.author: wanyingd1996

replies.bodyText: Ah, yes, that is similar. @dapengzhang0, what do you think?
replies.author: ejona86

replies.bodyText: I don't mind if @wanyingd1996 takes  #6107 over. Actually I forgot about that PR.
replies.author: dapengzhang0

replies.bodyText: I think the text I suggested in dapengzhang0's PR is still appropriate. When talking just about interceptors (as was the case with language like "gRPC will fail to notify the application"), then this isn't the correct spot for it.
replies.author: ejona86

timeline.bodyText: The CI is failing because both of these lines exceed 100 columns. Please rewrap these lines.
timeline.author: ejona86
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -141,6 +141,10 @@ public void onMessage(T message) {} * An additional block of trailer metadata may be received at the end of the call from the * server. An empty {@link Metadata} object is passed if no trailers are received. * + *

This method should not throw. If this method throws, there is no way to be notified of the
